title: WTF so many bots in aram?
body:
Doing ARAM to level a new account and I shit you not every game I get into has bots. I can deal with it normally but this last one all 4 of my team mates were bots, they literally followed each other around in a little line at the start of the game and proceeded to die over and over.

Wtf is this man? Is this normal now?

replies.body:
Best way to avoid bots is group with 4 other human players to play ARAM. There will be a slight waiting time to find another team of humans, but if the pairing system cannot do it, then you massacre bots.

Here is a test for you... which two players were bots in this game?

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/89550907/200912352?tab=overview
Aatrox and Graves. They always have ghost and snowball
there still is pretty sure, had 2 follow me in sr
Yes there are bots in ARAM, when i was playing with a friend that wasn't level 30 there were bots on both teams. once you are 30 there shouldn't be any bots.
